markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Swarm Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=2414)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 270

**Domain**
[Swarm](/Domains.aspx?ID=120)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You discorporate into a swarm of Tiny creatures. While in swarm form, you are the same size, you have the [swarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=707) trait and you gain [resistance](/Rules.aspx?ID=2312) 5 to slashing and piercing damage and weakness 5 to area and [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=699) damage. You can fit into spaces only a few inches wide, moving your constituent creatures through the gap, and you can share a space with another creature. You don’t gain the [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=78) ability, so you are still affected normally by mental effects. As a swarm, you can’t speak, [cast spells](/Actions.aspx?ID=2734), use [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645) actions requiring your hands, [activate your magic items](/Actions.aspx?ID=100), or make any of your [Strikes](/Rules.aspx?ID=2895) with your normal body. While in swarm form, you can crawl all over any creature that shares your space as a single action. That creature must attempt a Fortitude save against your spell DC or become [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=91) 1 (sickened 2 on a critical failure). You can [Dismiss](/Actions.aspx?ID=2311) the Spell.

---
**Heightened (+2)** Your resistances and weaknesses each increase by 5.
name: Swarm Form
